description:
It was a beautiful summer day at our borrowed desert resort house. It was really hot, but a pool and hot weather make for a good sex day!
Trey and Curtis were lounging by the pool, stroking themselves, getting ready for some fun.
"What's in store for today?" we asked.
"More fucking," Trey said. "More dirtiness, ass licking, butt stuffing."
I love how nasty Trey has become!
"I'm gonna eat his ass," Trey added, nodding at Curtis.
"I'm gonna suck his dick," Curtis replied.
"And then I'm gonna FUCK him," Trey said, emphasis on the "FUCK."
"Yep," Curtis said.
Too funny! Horny boys with a plan!
title: Curtis & Trey
